name: Tap Drift Car
description:
This is a game to control the car drifting through the corner, simulate the real drifting.Higher levels of cars can be got by merge,that have better handling.A variety of different cool cars waiting for you to collect, 3000 different game tracks waiting for you to challenge one by one.

The game starts, the car will automatically advance.press the mouse and turn the car right,release the mouse and turn the car left.So easy.
The game has a large number of levels, the difficulty gradually increases.
The game automatically generates a large amount of gold each day, which is used to purchase cars that can be merge into higher level cars and challenge more difficult levels.
The excitement and thrill of racing can be experienced in the game.
The game is simple and very decompress, so come and enjoy the immersive gaming experience.
